autoTrackRolls.name: Roll Auto-Tracking
autoTrackRolls.hint: Whether or not the module should automatically add rolls made in the chat to the database. This is useful if the system you're using has implemented an integration with the module, or if you only want macros to handle the database additions.

globalAPI.name: Global API
globalAPI.hint: Whether or not the module provides a global interface for interacting with the module's backend. This is convenient for macros and using the dev console.
